user_story: As an event manager, I want to assign a start- and end date-and-time to an event.
As an event manager, I want to assign staff to work on an event, such that these people will get information about this event.
As an event coordinator, I want to have access to artistsâ€™ contact information.
As an Employee, I want to view the events I am assigned to, such that I can prepare accordingly.
As an Employee, I want to primarily see the details relevant to my role, such that information overload is prevented.
As an artist, I want to have access to information about the events I'll play at.
As an employee, I want to get notifications only for emergencies and imminent deadlines, such that the importance of notifications is not undercut by their frequency.
